title: FAQ & Support
subtitle:
Didn’t find the answer you were looking for?
Get in touch with our support team!

faqs.q: How do I change my password?
faqs.a: To change your password, go to Menu → Profile, open your profile, enter your current and new password, then tap Confirm.

faqs.q: How do I change my profile status?
faqs.a: Open your profile, tap Status, choose the new status and save your changes.
Go to Contacts → Options → Export and choose your preferred format to download.

faqs.q: How can I delete my account?
faqs.a: Go to Settings → Account → Delete account. Carefully follow the confirmation steps.
